www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

This week’s case starts with two calls to 911. The homeowners are reporting a break in at their home. When police arrive, they find one person injured and another dead.
Beer of the Week - Razz the Roof Garage Grade - 3 and 3 quarter bottle caps
